title: Embroidered Picture, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: satin weave, embroidered with silk floss and hand-painted
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Landscape showing a stream with rocks, trees, grass and a bridge; two women fishing, one wading in the stream. In a border of blue satin with urns, vines, birds in oval medallions, scrolls, etc.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Picture, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Medium: silk
Technique: satin weave, embroidered with silk floss and hand-painted. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1928-16-41.
